  • Background

Class Background

The background shorthand property sets all background style properties at once, such as color, image, origin and size, or repeat method. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background

Hierarchy

  • Background

Properties

attachment

attachment: BackgroundAttachment[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1042

A list of BackgroundAttachment definition for multiple layers.

blendMode

blendMode: string[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1071

A list of BlendMode definition for multiple layers.

clip

clip: BackgroundClip[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1054

A list of BackgroundClip definition for multiple layers.

Optional color

color: Color
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1038

The color property sets the background color of an element. It is rendered behind any background-image that is specified, although the color will still be visible through any transparency in the image.

image

image: IBackgroundImage[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1046

A list of IBackgroundImage definition for multiple layers.

origin

origin: BackgroundClip[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1059

A list of BackgroundOrigin definition for multiple layers. Note: clip and origin are use same enum definition.

position: BackgroundPosition[] = []
  • Defined in style/Background.ts:1067

A list of BackgroundPosition definition for multiple layers.

Private drawImage

  • drawImage(ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D, img: HTMLImageElement, imgWidth: number, imgHeight: number, imageScaleX: number, imageScaleY: number, destX: number, destY: number, clip: Rect): void
    • Defined in style/Background.ts:1493

    Draw an image to context with specified size, scale and destination in a clip area.

    Parameters

    • ctx: CanvasRenderingContext2D

      The canvas rendering context of stage canvas.

    • img: HTMLImageElement

      The image to draw.

    • imgWidth: number

      The image width.

    • imgHeight: number

      The image height.

    • imageScaleX: number

      The horizontal scale of the image.

    • imageScaleY: number

      The vertical scale of the image.

    • destX: number

      The X destination position.

    • destY: number

      The Y destination position.

    • clip: Rect

      The clip area.

    Returns void

    • Defined in style/Background.ts:1029

Static of

  • of(value: string, silent?: boolean): Background | undefined
    • Defined in style/Background.ts:745

    Parse a string format background definition to a background instance. See the definition at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background

    Parameters

    • value: string

      Input string to be parsed.

    • Default value silent: boolean = false

    Returns Background | undefined

    A Background instance of valid data, undefined otherwise.

Static Private parseImage

  • parseImage(value: string): IBackgroundImage | undefined
    • Defined in style/Background.ts:942

    Try to parse a string to a BackgroundImage instance.

    Parameters

    • value: string

      A string presents image attribute.

    Returns IBackgroundImage | undefined

    A BackgroundImage instance for a valid definition, undefined otherwise.

Static Private split

  • split(value: string): string[]
    • Defined in style/Background.ts:962

    The Background property supports multiple layers, this function is used to split layers from a string.

    Parameters

    • value: string

      A string to be split.

    Returns string[]

    A list of split strings.
